summary: This mod adds Witcher Universe-inspired magic to the game and introduces Witcher Universe lore to The Elder Scrolls World in a delicate way. Witcher signs, powerful mages' spells, witchers' powers etc, New Realms, Forts is what you will find here.
descriptionHtml:
Please give this mod a [b]LIKE[/b] if you like it!! ★★★★ = New Big Update!! 
<br />Thank all of you for your support! 
<br />It means alot to me! :) 
<br />
<br />!SEE THE CHANGELOG AFTER EACH PATCH! 
<br />
<br />[b]IF YOU ARE UNSURE JUST DON'T RATE!!!!![/b] 
<br />
<br />IMPORTANT NOTE: THIS IS A TEST VERSION. STABLE BUT NOT 100% READY TO USE. 
<br />
<br />Current version: 
<br />PRE-ALPHA [b]0.04b[/b] 
<br />
<br />This mod adds Witcher Universe-inspired magic to the game and introduces Witcher Universe lore to The Elder Scrolls World in a delicate way. Witcher signs, powerful mages' spells, witchers' powers etc, New Realms, Forts is what you will find here. 
<br />
<br />Witcher Signs Video: [url=steam://openurl/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hKJnMqsEiL8]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hKJnMqsEiL8[/url] 
<br />
<br />List of added content: (v0.04b) 
<br />Added a whole new world - The Realm of Aen Elle!! (Not ready to use) 
<br />Added a witcher fortress - Kaer Gurde! 
<br />[b]Powers:[/b] 
<br />- Witcher's Night Vision (See in the dark) 
<br />[b]Witcher Signs:[/b] 
<br />- Aard (Targeted version and AoE version) 
<br />- Igni (Flame gout version and Flame Burst version) 
<br />- Quen (Armor enhancing magical defense spell) 
<br />- Yrden (Magical trap - rune) 
<br />- Axii (Mind Control version and Speech Enhance) 
<br />[b]Spells for Mages:[/b] 
<br />- Alzur's Thunder (A powerful, expert destruction spell created by legendary Alzur himself) 
<br />- Alzur's Shield (A very strong defense spell) 
<br />- Aspect of the Gods (An extremely powerful, 15 second-channeling expert Illusion spell with mega buffs and boosts) 
<br />- Blessing of Melitele (An Adept Restoration healing + buff spell) 
<br />- Cleanse Blood (Neutralizes poisoning effects) 
<br />
<br />How to test the spells - Step By Step: 
<br />VIDEO: [url=steam://openurl/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VZF6IBShe3A]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VZF6IBShe3A[/url] 
<br />1. Open up the console with the tilde key (~). 
<br />2. Type in "help" + a sign or power you wish to add. 
<br />Ex. "help aard" 
<br />3. Use the "Page Up" key to find the desired entry in console. 
<br />4. Type "player.addspell" + the ID of the spell. 
<br />Ex. "player.addspell 01010d12" 
<br />5. Have fun. Remember to use the godmode for testing or if you don't have enough magicka to cast the spell. Open up the console, type in "tgm". 
<br />
<br />Recommended mods: 
<br />- Ultimate Witcher Expierience (I highly recommend that you don't use author's spells because they are buggy) 
<br />
<br />[b]PayPal Donate:[/b] (You don't have to donate, but I am working very hard to bring you the best content I can so a gift is always appreciated, also a game of ours is coming to Steam Greenlight) 
<br />[url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=UZRUQB8L3U7TN]https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=UZRUQB8L3U7TN[/url] 
<br />
<br />Share your opinions on my ideas and tell me if you like them. 
<br />Please Like, Favorite and Share!
author: Captain Fox
